trends: There has been one other sighting in Kensington
There were no other sightings in Kensington on or around September 22nd 2013
divs: sighting detailsi was leaving seabrook and heading home through kensington. driving alone in my car. i turned onto route 150 in kensington by the intersection, there was a car behind me. and at one point while driving i see a bright light (blue\blue-green) pass above the trees from the right side to the left side of the road. i noticed it because the sky was dark. i immediately noticed it had a disc shape, and was like a blue flame that turned different shades of bright blue. it lasted about 4-5 seconds. as soon as i saw the object i paid close attention to see what it was doing. at about 5 seconds it disappeared into nothing. it was moving very fast like a shooting star, but it was lower than a plane would be. i was struck that it was an actual object shaped like a blue disc (like a flame that flickered) and moving very fast. my first thought on seeing it was "the shape looks like a persons lips". what i mean by lips is skinny on the ends and thick in the middle. the disc shape is a better way of describing it. i thought about pulling onto a side road to see if i could see it again in some big open field. i felt excited driving home. i was trying to think about what i had seen. i searched on twitter to see if anyone saw it too. there was a car behind me that may or may not have seen it. we were both in line of the object in the sky at the same time. i thought about telling people about it, and they would say, "it was fireworks." i can guarantee. but this was flying horizontal and a big solid shape, brightly lit with almost neon blue.
Summary: driving in my car, see a bright blue/teal disc object fly over the road
